episodes.title: Woman Shunned by Family for Leaving Church Cult and the Pastor's Wife does a Runner!😮
episodes.description:
If you like the video, then please support the channel by hitting the like button as it will really help with spreading awareness of spiritual abuse within church cults. 

This video reports on cult behaviour where a woman is shunned by her own family just because she no longer wants to attend 'The Gospel' church also known as The 'Gospel' cult.. 

It is important to note that The Gospel cult has around 80 members including men, women, children and infants. And is completely independent with no other branches. 

Furthermore, the autocratic pastor's wife has done a runner and alleges that her husband has been abusive to her on many occasions.

This autocratic pastor claims to be a 'spiritual covering' over his church and the members of the church truly believe they must be under his covering to receive salvation! 😮 Yet, the pastor cannot even cover his own wife. 

Wake up guys and stop believing in this 'spiritual covering' rubbish. The spiritual covering non-sense is a false teaching designed to exploit you and control you. 

*1 Timothy 3:4-5 An overseer must manage his own household well and keep his children under control, with complete dignity. 5For if someone does not know how to manage his own household, how can he care for the church of God?*
